it.polimi.se2019.model.map

Class Direction

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.map.Direction

  • public class Direction
extends java.lang.Object
    A Direction is an attribute of square containing information about adjacent elements in one of four cardinal direction. It contains a reference to the next square in that direction

      Generate a new direction

    • Constructor Detail

      • Direction

        public Direction(Square s,
                 boolean b)
        Generate a new direction
        Parameters:
        s - The next square in this direction
        b - True if the next square is not accessible, false otherwise

    • Method Detail

      • setBlocked

        protected void setBlocked(boolean isBlocked)
        Parameters:
        isBlocked - specifies whether there is a wall in this direction

      • getSquare

        public Square getSquare()
        Returns:

      • isBlocked

        public boolean isBlocked()
        Returns:
        true if the direction is blocked, false otherwise

      • isAccessible

        public boolean isAccessible()
        Returns:
